attributes.action: Hold an all-party inquiry into the future of the National Health Service.
attributes.background: The NHS is our greatest national asset but has become a political football. The time has come to put party differences aside and the health of our nation first.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because it is unclear what action you would like taken, and which environmental issues you would want this inquiry to look at.

There already exists a cross party Committee of MPs that looks at the issue of health services- the Health Committee. You can learn more about its work by visiting its website http://www.parliament.uk/business/committees/committees-a-z/commons-select/health-committee/
